column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////I once came here for dinner on Friday and again for brunch the following Sunday
column2: so clearly I'm in love with CBBR. I have tried pretty much everything on the menu and have never been diasppointed. My personal faves: patatas bravas (of course)
column6: and all of the paellas. Seriously though
column7: the paella is amazing and it is well worth the wait.
